text:
Nichika, it's about time──
...What's wrong? Why the gloomy face?

You trying to say my face
looks terrible or something?

...It's all done properly.
You don't need to worry or be nervous.

Just go out there
with your usual great expression, Nichika.

...To be myself, you mean...
Is my "terrible" face okay though...?

With such a cute costume,
I'll make sure it shines!
